Reviews.Title: Horrible Telephone!
Reviews.Author: C. Huff
Reviews.Content: I wanted a wireless telephone for talk and text functionality. The Kyocera Domino seemed like a good deal, because of the low price. I WAS WRONG!!! The telephone requires resetting at least once a day and the buttons cycle through the applications at will. Texting is a painful experience as the spacing keys work irregularly. I do not recommend this phone for anyone or any purpose. Deserves zero stars.

Reviews.Title: Cheap!
Reviews.Author: Odom
Reviews.Content: Everything about this phone feels cheap, down to the mushy buttons and poor screen. But for $10, who can complain! Also, its very durable, holds up to most all stress tests ive put it through (and when i did successfully break it, another $10 to replace!)

Reviews.Title: please. thank you.
Reviews.Author: janie
Reviews.Content: I buy this cell for my mom. Shes 71 years old. Its easy for her to use it. Please keep saleing this cell phone. Dont sale just the touch cell phones. Dont. Please think about use. Were not 16, 20 30 years old to use the touch phones. We need the basic cell phones. Now the days the numbers are geting smiler smiler. We cannt see anymore. Thank about use too. Please. Thank you janie (San Juanita)

Reviews.Title: nice for a spare.not a everyday phone
Reviews.Author: Dwayne W. James
Reviews.Content: no sim card and buttons too close togather Old model and needed software updates. data cable would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Nearly indestructible
Reviews.Author: Habib
Reviews.Content: I dropped mine in the toilet (which was clean, thank God) and it didn't even drop the call. I turned it off, after telling my friend I had to hang up, and let it dry. And still got another year out of it! And that's with constant dropping out of my lap and onto the parking lot.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and Easy
Reviews.Author: Z. Djatdoev
Reviews.Content: Nice reliable phone. We bought a lot of fancy phones for the business and there was need in buying something not fancy, just to be able to call, and this phone is exactly what's needed

Reviews.Title: It is what I expected
Reviews.Author: J.R.M
Reviews.Content: It is what I expected, I needed a basic phone to have basic funtions, happy with it, I would recommend it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Uncomplicated candybar phone--perfect for voice and text communications
Pay as you go with no contracts from Cricket; get nationwide unlimited talk, text, and mobile web via a monthly PAYGo plan
Hands-free communication via speakerphone; personal organizer tools
Up to 3.3 hours of talk time, up to 200 hours (8+ days) of standby time; released in November, 2009
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: Kyocera S1310 Domino Prepaid Phone (Cricket)
